name: Ludum-Dare-42-Inventory-Rush
description:
Didn't get time to properly playtest and balance but I'm tired so ¯\_(ツ)_/¯.

The goal is to manage your inventory in order to have the highest total value possible. Drag items out of inventory to discard, drag and drop to rearrange.

NPCs will give your player items in the game when they touch you, occasionally one of the non noble npcs may take one of your items and replace it with trash. You can move with WASD to avoid npcs if you wish.

Not really happy with how it turned out but I'm too tired :(
